channel.title: [508] hell of tomorow [508]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/welcomescreen.jpg[/img] Hello and welcome to my server release of [b][u]Hell Of Tomorrow.[/u][/b] [b]Download link's.[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/v/DGAEID6R]Uppit[/url] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/227620062/Hell_of_Tomorow.rar.html]Rapidshare[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=b11b646a91db6eb60dec85adfe0a530acde8a24a3ef37e805be6ba49b5870170]Mediafire.[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=N0WT0ZN4]Megaupload[/url] Here is a little bit about the server, [ul][li]100% Trading (no lie refer to pictures)[/li] [li]100% Pm (no lie refer to pictures)[/li] [li]95% Godwars Dungeon (no entrance use ::gwd to get there)[/li] [li]Npc Training (but master for player rights 2)[/li] [li]All Npc's Drop something.[/li] [li]Godwars bosses all drop the correct drop's, Like godswords.[/li] [li]5 minute inactive log out timer (like runescape)[/li] [li]60% Pickpocketing.[/li] [li]Every skill is trainable.[/li][/ul] Commands
---Commands--- Normal players ::smoke ::players ::modern ::lunar ::ancients ::gwd ::revive ::jad ::kq ::train ::kbd ::1v1 ::teampk Moderators ::xteletome ::xteleto ::master ::vmelee ::vrange ::food ::barrage ::mpots ::rpots ::armor ::veracs ::guthans ::torags ::ahrims ::pk1 ::fury ::dboots ::firecape ::dfs ::bandosarmor ::armadylarmor ::godswords ::runes ::rfdgloves ::skillhoods ::skillcapes ::skillcapest Admin && Owner ::demote ::pass ::givemod ::item ::tele ::mhamed1 ::mhamed2
The command's list is also in the server folder. [center][b]Pictures[/b][/center] [b]Home[/b] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/Homearea.jpg[/img] [b]Training area[/b] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/trainingarea.jpg[/img] [b]Proof of trade[/b] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/trade1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/trade2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/trade3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/trade4.jpg[/img] [b]Proof of Pm[/b] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/Pm1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/Pm2.jpg[/img] [b]Shops[/b] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/shop1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/shop2.jpg[/img] [b]Other Things[/b] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/Edge.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/GWD.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/Jad.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/KBD.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Lunapic/Kq.jpg[/img] [hr] [b]Download link's Again.[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/v/DGAEID6R]Uppit[/url] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/227620062/Hell_of_Tomorow.rar.html]Rapidshare[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=b11b646a91db6eb60dec85adfe0a530acde8a24a3ef37e805be6ba49b5870170]Mediafire.[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=N0WT0ZN4]Megaupload[/url] [b]And Again[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/v/DGAEID6R]Uppit[/url] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/227620062/Hell_of_Tomorow.rar.html]Rapidshare[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=b11b646a91db6eb60dec85adfe0a530acde8a24a3ef37e805be6ba49b5870170]Mediafire.[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=N0WT0ZN4]Megaupload[/url] Credit's [code]65% Me 15% MysticFlow (R00nServa) 5% Tutorials 5% jc22493 (for his multi tut) 10% Psycotix [/code] [size=15pt]Thankyou, Hope you enjoy...[/size]

item.title: [508] hell of tomorow [508]
item.dc:creator: @Valhalla95 Valhalla95
item.description:
@Valhalla95 wrote:

[quote=“zane01, post:10, topic:276610”]I would download this source if it had more commands. Here are some suggestions…

giveowner
giveadmin
gay
dparty
xrichie
member
It also needs a bit more areas: barrows, bounty hunter, and duel area.
And just a bit more items in the shops, those items are great but add some: dclaws, dplate, ect. The more customs the better.

Overall: Great work for a first-time creator? You Did Awesome, Hopeing for a v2 to come out. Good Luck, Cya.[/quote]
add them

Read full topic

item.title: [508] hell of tomorow [508]
item.dc:creator: @simtoon simtoon
item.description:
@simtoon wrote:

You can in \Hell of Tomorow\src\palidino76\rs2\io\login.java look for rights and where it has rights line 199 if (p.username.equals(“name here”)) { put the username of the account you have, recompile and run.

Read full topic

Also, anyone have an idea how to change player rights, the .txt files in /characters always revert back to 0, no matter what.

item.title: [508] hell of tomorow [508]
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

[quote=“d0nt v3ng, post:30, topic:276610”][quote author=mad_moparscapian link=topic=365273.msg2771911#msg2771911 date=1241197727]

This is basically BloodRain [508] created by MysticFlow, to me all you have done is moved some NPC’s around and changed Name, and edited the starting XY coords… I think “MysticFlow” deserves most credits.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2009, 10:16:22 am[/size][hr]EDIT: Sorry please change the credits from Bloodrain508 to “MysticFlow”

May you share which bug’s you fixed im sure i would like to know as i am using the original BloodRain.

I actually fixed a few bugs and added quite a few area’s and thankyou for the name (“MysticFlow”) I couldnt remember thats why i put Bloodrain

When you open teh shop 9 times out of ten it will swap to inv instead of staying on old tab, Fixed noting in banks, Added a lot of commands. added drops to the godwarts bosses and other Npc’s there…fixed low alch…

Must i continue?

[/quote]

Its supposed to Swap to Invo, commands are easy to add its spelt Godwars not “Godwarts”, and Low alch worked for me always…[/quote]

It didn’t for me… Dude Honestly i’ve added alot…

Read full topic
